1.Pros: SOME of the crew are very nice
1.Cons: The Shift Managers that have been there for 20+ years are abusive to other managers and crew members

2.Pros: It's a good employment opportunity for high school students
2.Cons: It's very unorganized and management is lazy.

3.Pros: Flexible schedule, great people, bosses that will work with you.

4.Pros: Sometimes I get to have a cheeseburger if there are too many cheeseburgers. Then I can eat it and be happy that I am not so hungry anymore. That is a good thing
4.Cons: But then there are times when I don't get to have a cheeseburger and that makes me a sad panda for the day and I have to hide my cries so the boss doesn't get mad

5.Pros: You get a half off discount. Cool job while in high school or after graduation before college.
5.Cons: It was stressful having to cook so many orders for lots of customer during lunch hours

6.Pros: Yummy Food, Nice people to work with
6.Cons: Gross Environment, hours are not easily moveable

7.Pros: Free food - Breaks - Flexible - Friendly management - easy advancement - help with schooling - raises
7.Cons: Broken A.C - Often very rude and abusive customers - often short hours

8.Pros: It's bad food but getting to eat fries whenever is great, usually the staff is funny so working isn't so boring

9.Pros: - Helps build soft skills- Always need people/always hiring- Hours to grab- More chill work environment- Free food if we make food cost- Bonus if we make food cost as a manager- Crew outings
9.Cons: - Customers are rude- A lot of people call off so you have to pick up the slack- Pay isn't enough- Always short staffed
